name: BlackInSpace
description:
Description

Get ready for an out-of-this-world puzzle adventure! Our latest game, set on a futuristic low-poly spaceship in deep space, challenges you to break the rules and bend reality to your will. As the main character, you'll play as a plucky black alien who uses duct tape to fix the broken rules that keep getting in your way.

With its stunning 3D graphics and mind-bending puzzles, this game is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat. Explore the intricate levels of the spaceship, each one more challenging than the last, and use your wits and problem-solving skills to navigate the obstacles and reach your goals.

Whether you're a seasoned puzzle veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this game has something for everyone. So grab your duct tape, hop aboard the spaceship, and get ready for an adventure like no other!

Tutorial

Use the WASD keys to move around and explore the Space Station. Remember, every step you take could be the key to unlocking the puzzle. Keep your wits about you and think carefully before making your move.

Luckily, you have access to some special abilities that can help you out of tight spots. Press the SPACE BAR to open the menu and access your abilities. You can break collisions to clear a path or break gravity to defy the laws of physics.

As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter all sorts of rules that must be followed in order to succeed. But don't worry, if you get stuck, you can always use the Reset Ability to start the level over from the beginning.

So what are you waiting for? Get ready to test your skills and conquer the challenges that await you in this thrilling new game!
